gobblin.runtime

Interface TaskStateTracker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTaskStateTracker, LocalTaskStateTracker, MRTaskStateTracker

    public interface TaskStateTracker
extends Service
    An interface for classes that track TaskStates.
